objects.text:
• 16.3MP X-Trans CMOS II Sensor
• Classic Retro-Styled Design
• Advanced Manual Control Dials
• Built-in Wi-Fi Connectivity

product_details.name: Fujifilm X-T10 Professional Mirrorless Camera | Classic Design Meets Modern Innovation
product_details.description:
• 16.3MP X-Trans CMOS II Sensor for exceptional image quality
• Classic retro-styled design with premium build quality
• Advanced manual control dials for precise shooting settings
• Compact and lightweight mirrorless body ideal for travel
• High-resolution electronic viewfinder (EVF)
• Tiltable LCD screen for creative composition
• Fast autofocus system with multiple focus points
• Built-in Wi-Fi connectivity for easy photo sharing
• Compatible with Fujifilm's X-mount lens system
• Film simulation modes for creative photography
• Full HD video recording capabilities
• Ergonomic grip for comfortable handling
• Multiple customizable function buttons
• Weather-sealed construction for durability

banner_details:
This banner features a professional product promotion layout for a mirrorless camera, creatively segmented into a grid layout. The left half focuses on promotional text elements, including a bold title ("heading"), a subtle subtitle ("subheading"), and a handwritten-style tagline ("tagline") in red for emphasis. Below, a bulleted list ("description") concisely highlights key product features. The right half showcases a high-quality product image ("product_image") and a prominent price display ("price") in large white text. Below the price, a red rounded rectangle acts as a call-to-action button ("cta_background") with center-aligned white text ("cta"). Overall, the layout balances modernity and clarity with high visual impact.

**Color Palette**:
- Charcoal Black (#1A1A1A)
- Gunmetal Gray (#252525 / #333333)
- Crimson Red (#D32F2F)
- White (#FFFFFF)
- Light Gray (#E0E0E0)
product_color: The product image showcases a Fujifilm X-T10 camera, dominated by sleek matte and glossy blacks, which exude professionalism and sophistication. The primary colors used include deep black (#1C1C1C), charcoal gray (#2E2E2E), metallic silver (#B0B0B0), and sharp white (#FFFFFF) for texts and markings. Subtle accent colors like red (#FF3B30), orange (#F7941D), and gold-green (#D4D97F) within the lens reflection add visual interest and highlight functionality. These colors blend elegantly with curved surfaces and polished textures, creating a premium feel. For an advertisement banner, a monochromatic dark background with vibrant accent overlays will enhance the camera's bold, modern appeal.
